title: The title track of the 2000 film 'Kya Kehna' was directly lifted from the popular song 'Oh Carol'. Which well known singer co-wrote and sang the original tune? - Quora

response.answer_text: "Oh! Carol" is an international hit written by Neil Sedaka in 1958. The song was co-written with Howard Greenfield. Source: Wikipedia.   Kya Kehna
